title: Słonina Wędzona – Traditional Smoked Lard | Bastion Smaku
content: The embellishment of every cuisine. Smoked bacon belongs with the traditional smoked meat line, whose flavor is given by rock salt and noble fruit wood smoke. Lard, an unquestioned delicacy in itself, is the hero of aromatic culinary improvisations. An irreplaceable delicacy which brings back your childhood memories.
